post:
We have moved from our old DC to new Dupont Fabros DC in Chicago. To celebrate this move, we are offering a 87% Off for life coupon for all our plans.

You can configure your own KVM VPS here in terms of vCPU, Memory, SSD Space, HDD Space, Traffic, IP Addresses: https://portal.cloudive.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=1

Coupon Code: TURNTHEPAGE

With our custom made control panel, you can have both SSD space and HDD space together in your VPS.

We use E5 16XX CPUs (Faster than E3s) and Samsung SSDs and Seagate Constellation HDDs.

Minimum configuration:


1 vCPU
1GB Memory
10GB SSD
1TB Traffic @ 1Gbps Uplink

Only $6.89 after the 87% Discount
Test IP: 172.245.38.4

Test File: http://172.245.38.4/1000MB.test
